item.title: AstraZeneca Q2 Beats On Cancer Drug Sales, Maintains Guidance — Shares Rise Premarket As Retail Cheers
item.description: Product sales rose 11% to $13.80 billion, or 95.4% of the total revenue, thanks to double-digit growth in Oncology and biopharmaceutical sales.

item.title: Tesla Expands India Presence With Second Showroom In Delhi; Model Y Orders Underway
item.description: Despite bullish investor sentiment, Tesla’s stock is down over 16% year-to-date.

item.title: Carvana Set Up For Strong Q2, Analysts Say, As Used Car Sales Boom In Trump-Tariff Era
item.description: Analysts expect adjusted profit to rise nearly three times.

item.title: Cipla In Buy Zone After Breakout, While Adani Faces Breakdown Risk: SEBI RA Dhruv Tuli
item.description: Technical indicators like RSI support Cipla’s bullish run, while recent breakdown past key support level signals bearish momentum for Adani Enterprise...

item.title: Oil Prices Edge Lower As Traders Remain Cautious After EU-US Trade Deal Ahead Of Fed Meet
item.description: Benchmark Brent crude prices were down 10 cents at $69.94 per barrel, while U.S. West Texas Intermediate crude prices were down 0.1% at $66.66 per bar...
